sourcesContent:
import './DetailsModal.css'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; function DetailsModal({transaction,closeDetails}) { const [editTransaction, setEditTransaction] = useState(transaction); return (
Transaction details {/*

{`${transaction.first_name} ${transaction.last_name}`}

{`Total Price: ${transaction.total_price} ${transaction.currency}`}

{`Address: ${transaction.country}, ${transaction.city}, ${transaction.street}`}

{`Credit Card: ${transaction.cerdit_card_number}, ${transaction.cerdit_card_type}`}

*/} {/* "customer_id": "813-86-3131", "first_name": "Benedikt", "last_name": "Abberley", "email": "babberley0@artisteer.com", "gender": "Male", "country": "Nicaragua", "city": "San Jorge", "street": "415 Green Lane", "phone": "887-564-6105", "total_price": "1329.12", "currency": "NIO", "cerdit_card_type": "mastercard", "cerdit_card_number": "5010126046192324" */}
); } export default DetailsModal;
